title: decay
body:
keep getting a message telling me my account will decay due to inactivity
i have played ranked games since getting the message that it will decay in six days, won some and lost some and now it has progressed to 4 days.
but
i
have
played
wtf

replies.body: You would have been getting the decay warning for your flex rank. Since you played a game about an hour ago you should stop getting the notification now :)

... do diamond players need to play more than a few games to avoid decay? i just played another one, won, and got the decay message again when logging in.

 w
t
f
